title.rendered: Australian pitches will suit our pacers a lot better: SA’s head coach after their losses in India

content.rendered:
After reviewing losses in ODIs and T20Is vs India, South Africa head coach Mark Boucher said that Australian pitches will suit their pacers definitely a “lot better” in T20 World Cup 2022. He stated,

We have got some good pace, some good bounce in our attack, so we need to keep the aggression there. South Africa return from India with an empty hand as they lost both ODIs 1-2, and T20Is 1-2.

Read also:‘Political vendetta in Ganguly’s removal from BCCI as he declined Amit Shah’s offer to join BJP’- TMC put allegations over BJP
